title: Complete T200 Fatima Team Card Set FS - $12,750 FINAL PRICE!
author: wondo

posts.post_title: Complete T200 Fatima Team Card Set FS - $12,750 FINAL PRICE!
posts.post_content:
I am selling a complete 1913 T200 Fatima team set of 16 cards.  Pictured on these cards are Hall of Famers such as Ty Cobb, Honus Wagner, Walter Johnson, Christy Mathewson, Tris Speaker, Pete Alexander, Nap Lajoie, and many others.  Joe Jackson and Jim Thorpe are two of the highlights of this set.  The set has a PSA aggregate grade of 4.33 which ranks it as the 4th highest current set on the PSA Registry.  Below are scans of the fronts of each card.  Please email me with any questions, requests.  The price is $12,750 dlvd registered mail - open to offers.  Next stop is breaking it up and piecing off the "commons" on ebay.  Thank you.

John Wondowski
[url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url]

John- having put this set together I know this is one tough cookie! The Boston National is incredibly tough and St. Louis AM and NATL and New York AL are also scarce. Good luck on the sale, your cards are in great shape.
tbob

stunning set.   

beautiful examples of each card!


good luck with the sale.
Thank you for the kind comments - new lower price!
